Room.Name: The Temple of Ahto
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a majestic temple, dedicated to Ahto, God of the Seas and Waters.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent Temple of Ahto pays homage to the powerful God of the Seas and Waters. The god Ahto was worshiped by many of the northern folk living on the northern island Rustallik'n. These people often traded with the people of Oceancrest, and some started migrating here. Nevertheless, Ahto became a major icon to the sailors and seamen who live day to day on the open seas.
